about_the_game:
Welcome to World of Stickman, an exciting real-time strategy world where you'll take part in epic battles of antiquity with Stickman heroes. Choose your civilization - Romans, Egyptians or Vikings - and go to war to rule the ancient world.

Game Features:
  • Epic Battles: Experience the scale of great battles in real time with hundreds of fighting stickmen. Control various types of troops such as swordsmen, pikemen, archers, ballistae and catapults to defeat the enemy.

    Building and Development: Your domain starts with a small settlement. Develop, build buildings, gather resources and strengthen your army. Upgrade buildings to gain access to new units and technologies.

    Campaign: Immerse yourself in an exciting campaign that reveals the stories and legends of each civilization. Meet unique characters, traverse key historical moments, and defeat enemies.
    Multiplayer and Online: Challenge your friends to battle in multiplayer mode or immerse yourself in online battles with players from around the world. Show off your strategic prowess and top the leaderboards.
    Unique Civilizations: Choose your side among a trio of powerful civilizations - Romans, Egyptians and Vikings. Each has unique features, units and strategic advantages.
    Cartoon Style: Immerse yourself in a colorful world brought to life with a unique cartoon style and 3D graphics. Watch stickmen battle it out in a fabulous world.

Take up the challenge and become a great leader in the classic World of Stickman military strategy game. Your strategy will decide the fate of the ancient world!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: World of Stickman Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: World of Stickman - classic war strategy with stickman heroes. Collect resources, build your base and hire a powerful army.
